description: Creates one API key for the specified organization. An organization API key grants programmatic access to an organization.

Href.description: Uniform Resource Locator (URL) that points another API resource to which this response has some relationship. This URL often begins with https://cloud.mongodb.com/api/atlas.

Rel.description: Uniform Resource Locator (URL) that defines the semantic relationship between this resource and another API resource. This URL often begins with https://cloud.mongodb.com/api/atlas.

Description.description: Purpose or explanation provided when someone created this organization API key.

Id.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies this organization API key assigned to this project.

Links.description: List of one or more Uniform Resource Locators (URLs) that point to API sub-resources, related API resources, or both. RFC 5988 outlines these relationships.

OrgId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies the organization that contains your projects. Use the /orgs endpoint to retrieve all organizations to which the authenticated user has access.

Profile.description: Redacted private key returned for this organization API key. This key displays unredacted when first created.

PublicKey.description: Public API key value set for the specified organization API key.

PrivateKey.description: Purpose or explanation provided when someone created this organization API key.

Roles.description: List of roles to grant this API key. If you provide this list, provide a minimum of one role and ensure each role applies to this organization.
